extDescription.message: Si toos ah ayuu ugu daraa lifaaqyadii asalka ahaa jawaabaha iimaylka.

uiNoOptions.message: Waqtigan xaadirka ah xulasho la dejiyo ma jiro.

uiSupport.message: Ma jeceshahay ku‑daro‑gaankan? I taageer deeq yar:

uiGithubText.message: Warbixinnada khaladaadka ama su’aalo kale, fadlan booqo

uiBlacklistHeader.message: Liiska madow ee magacyada faylka (qaabab glob)

uiBlacklistHelp.message: Faylasha magaca u dhigma mid ka mid ah qaababkan waligood si toos ah looma lifaaqi doono. Hal qaab halkii sadar. Tusaalooyin: *.png, smime.*, *.p7s

uiWarnBlacklistLabel.message: Digniin haddii lifaaqyada laga reebay liiska madow

uiConfirmLabel.message: Weydii ka hor inta aadan lifaaqyo ku darin

uiConfirmHelp.message: Sanduuq yar oo xaqiijin ah ayaa soo baxa oo keliya marka lifaaqyo dhab ahaan la dari lahaa. Kiiboodh: Y ama J = Haa; N ama Esc = Maya.

warnBlacklistIntro.message: Faylasha soo socda si toos ah looma lifaaqi doono:
